BE001.beverageDescription: Indulge in the timeless elegance of a cappuccino and discover why it remains a beloved favorite among coffee connoisseurs worldwide.

BE002.beverageDescription: Embrace the bold intensity and rich flavor of our espresso, the foundation of many coffee creations.

BE003.beverageDescription: Indulge in the mellow sophistication of our Americano and discover a coffee experience that is both refined and approachable.

BE004.beverageDescription: Our experienced baristas carefully prepare each Irish Coffee, ensuring the perfect balance of whiskey, coffee, and cream.

BE005.beverageDescription: Embrace the rich, chocolatey indulgence of our Mocha and discover a coffee experience that is both decadent and delightful.

BE006.beverageDescription: Embrace the rich, buttery goodness of our handcrafted caramel and discover a flavor that will tantalize your taste buds and elevate your culinary creations.

BE007.beverageDescription: Indulge in the refreshing coolness and bold espresso flavor of our Iced Americano and discover a coffee experience that is both invigorating and satisfying.

BE008.beverageDescription: Indulge in the refreshing coolness, creamy richness, and harmonious flavors of our Iced Oat Milk Latte and discover a coffee experience that is both unique and delightful.

BE009.beverageDescription: Our Peach Orange Lemongrass Tea is best enjoyed chilled or over ice, making it the perfect beverage for a hot day or any time you need a refreshing pick-me-up.

BE010.beverageDescription: The sweetness comes from the natural sugars present in pineapples, while the tanginess adds a delightful zing that awakens your taste buds. The aroma is equally enticing, filled with the distinctive tropical fragrance of fresh pineapples.

BE011.beverageDescription: The vibrant red color hints at the explosion of flavor waiting for you â€“ a wave of sweetness balanced by a touch of subtle watermelon rind tartness. Every mouthful is refreshingly cool and hydrating, perfect for quenching your thirst on a hot day.

BE012.beverageDescription: Its distinctive flavor profile is characterized by a harmonious blend of black tea and the zesty citrus notes of bergamot oil, a fragrant oil extracted from the rind of bergamot oranges.

BE013.beverageDescription: a captivating blend of delicate floral essence and subtle tea notes, has long been revered for its soothing and invigorating properties. The hallmark of jasmine tea lies in its captivating fragrance, a symphony of delicate jasmine blossoms intertwined with the gentle aroma of tea leaves

BE014.beverageDescription: Green tea possesses a gentle, refreshing fragrance, reminiscent of fresh grass, jasmine blossoms, or young rice leaves, evoking a sense of tranquility and invigoration.

BE015.beverageDescription: Herbal tea, also known as tisane or infusion, is a delightful beverage made from a diverse array of herbs, flowers, fruits, spices, and roots. Herbal teas encompass a vast spectrum of flavors, ranging from sweet and fruity to earthy and spicy.

BE016.beverageDescription: Orange juice, with its vibrant flavor, nutritional value, and versatility, can be a delightful and beneficial addition to a healthy lifestyle. Orange juice offers a refreshing reminder of the sun's warmth and the goodness of nature's bounty.
